Header: Phottuwa is expecting two-thirds at the General Election
Content: The Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna Front states that the main expectation of the party for the new year is to win a two-thirds majority in the general election. Its chairman, Prof. G.L. Peiris stated this joining at a press conference held at the head office of Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna in their headquarters in Battaramulla yesterday. State Minister Dilum Amunugama also participated in the media briefing
